original_text: He said to them, “Cast the net on the right side of the boat, and you will find some.” So they cast it, and now they were not able to haul it in, because of the quantity of fish.
korean_text: 이르시되 그물을 배 오른편에 던지라 그리하면 잡으리라 하시니 이에 던졌더니 물고기가 많아 그물을 들 수 없더라

sentences.original_text: Cast the net on the right side of the boat,
and now they were not able to haul it in,
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그들은 그것을 끌어 올릴 수 없었으니,

sentences.original_text: because of the quantity of fish.
